Name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

Achievements.Name: Go to Hogwarts.
Achievements.Description: Complete the Grimmauld Place tutorials.

Achievements.Name: Get to the Room of Requirement.
Achievements.Description: Discover the Room of Requirement.

Achievements.Description: Recruit Dumbledore's Army.

Achievements.Name: Unhinge Umbridge.
Achievements.Description: Cause chaos in Umbridge's Hogwarts.

Achievements.Name: Finish the story.
Achievements.Description: Finish the story.

Achievements.Name: Win the Characters Cup.
Achievements.Description: Meet all characters in the game.

Achievements.Name: Win the Explorer Cup.
Achievements.Description: Discover all known areas of Hogwarts.

Achievements.Name: Win the Defence Cup.
Achievements.Description: Cast all defensive spells in a single encounter.

Achievements.Name: Win the Portrait Password Cup.
Achievements.Description: Discover the password for every shortcut portrait in Hogwarts.

Achievements.Name: Win the House Ghost Cup
Achievements.Description: Find all the house ghosts of Hogwarts.

Achievements.Name: Win the Ornithology Cup.
Achievements.Description: Find all the flying creatures of Hogwarts.

Achievements.Name: Win the Homework Cup.
Achievements.Description: Complete all the teacher mini-quests.

Achievements.Name: Win the Grand Master Cup.
Achievements.Description: Beat all wizard chess champions.

Achievements.Name: Win the Exploding Snap Cup.
Achievements.Description: Beat all Exploding Snap champions.

Achievements.Name: Win the Golden Gobstone Cup.
Achievements.Description: Beat all Gobstones champions.

Achievements.Name: Win the Friend of the Year Cup.
Achievements.Description: Find Luna's lost belongings.

Achievements.Name: Win the Architecture Cup.
Achievements.Description: Uncover all the hidden Hogwarts symbols.

Achievements.Name: Win the Smuggler Cup.
Achievements.Description: Find Fred and George's hidden parcels.

Achievements.Name: Win the Secret Statue Cup.
Achievements.Description: Find the secret chess statues of Hogwarts.

Achievements.Name: Win the Witches and Wizards Cup
Achievements.Description: Find the hidden wizard plaques around Hogwarts.

Achievements.Name: Win the Nature Trail Cup.
Achievements.Description: Find all the rare creature tracks hidden in Hogwarts.

Achievements.Name: Win the School Pride Cup.
Achievements.Description: Tidy up Hogwarts.

Achievements.Name: Finish on hardest difficulty
Achievements.Description: Finish the story on the hardest difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Win the Studious Success Cup.
Achievements.Description: Got an 'O' in all lessons.

Achievements.Name: Magic 500
Achievements.Description: Cast 500 successful spells.

Achievements.Name: Walk the Platform
Achievements.Description: Covered 9 3/4 miles.

Achievements.Name: DA Ten
Achievements.Description: Recruited 10 members of the DA.

Achievements.Description: Recruited 20 members of the DA.
